javadoc: An AddressOverflowException occurs when an attempt to add or subtract a displacement would result in a value which is outside the address space.

name: AddressOverflowException
comment:
An AddressOverflowException occurs when an attempt to
 add or subtract a displacement would result in a value which
 is outside the address space.
